Detailed Description

A class to generate a minimal perfect hash function.

  • A mphf maps a static set of n keys into a set of m integer numbers.
  • Minimal means that m is equal to n, thus all hash values are within [0, m).
  • Perfect means that the hash function produces no collisions.
  • This class is a wrapper of the CMPH library.
Author:
martin.trenkmann@uni-weimar.de
See also:
http://cmph.sourceforge.net

Created on Jun 22, 2008
